# Patch Definitions File
# Format: patch-name.patch|file/path/to/modify.cs|Brief description
# Lines starting with # are comments

syncplay-optimizations.patch|Emby.Server.Implementations/SyncPlay/SyncPlayManager.cs|AI optimizations for SyncPlay session management
syncplay-group.patch|Emby.Server.Implementations/SyncPlay/Group.cs|Enhanced group management with better session handling
trickplay-optimizations.patch|Jellyfin.Server.Implementations/Trickplay/TrickplayManager.cs|Optimized trickplay generation
trickplay-timeout-fix.patch|MediaBrowser.MediaEncoding/Encoder/MediaEncoder.cs|Fix trickplay timeout for hardware acceleration initialization
subtitle-encoder-optimizations.patch|MediaBrowser.MediaEncoding/Subtitles/SubtitleEncoder.cs|Improved subtitle extraction performance
group-member-enhancements.patch|MediaBrowser.Controller/SyncPlay/GroupMember.cs|Enhanced GroupMember with additional properties
playqueue-fix.patch|MediaBrowser.Controller/SyncPlay/Queue/PlayQueueManager.cs|PlayQueue manager improvements
trickplay-options.patch|MediaBrowser.Model/Configuration/TrickplayOptions.cs|Updated trickplay configuration options
au-ratings-pg-score.patch|Emby.Server.Implementations/Localization/Ratings/au.json|Fix AU PG rating score from 15 to 13
video-async-delete.patch|MediaBrowser.Controller/Entities/Video.cs|Change deletion of orphaned video to async method
